Code preview of 我方帐号信息管理表sl_bank_account

drop table if exists sl_bank_account;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: sl_bank_account */
/*==============================================================*/
create table sl_bank_account
(
bankAccountId bigint(20) not null auto_increment comment 'id号',
openType smallint(6) not null comment '开户类型',
accountType smallint(6) not null comment '账户类型',
openBankId int(11) not null comment '开户行',
name varchar(100) not null comment '开户名',
account varchar(100) not null comment '帐号',
rawMoney numeric(10,2) comment '初期金额',
finalMoney numeric(10,2) comment '末期余额',
recordTime datetime comment '记录时间',
primary key (bankAccountId),
key ACCOUNT_BANK (openBankId)
);

alter table sl_bank_account comment '我方帐号信息管理表';
